level.heading: APPOINTMENT OF A MEDIATOR PURSUANT TO 47 U.S.C. ยง 252(A)(2) (ยง 15-2606) The Commission shall appoint a mediator(s). The mediator may be a Commissiontaff member and/or any competent, impartial, and disinterested person. Theequesting carrier and all participants in the negotiation for which mediationas been requested shall be notified by the Commission Secretary of theppointment of the mediator within five (5) business days of the date on whichhe request for mediation is filed.
SOURCE
